summary: Hardened the single-file app.tsx by typing project categories, centralizing category labels and project lookup, guarding browser actions, stabilizing responsive detection, and clamping media gallery indexing without changing UI or canvas preview.

testing.notes: Manual verification pending for section scroll/dock navigation, folder interactions, timeline-to-sheet navigation, share/mail actions, and canvas preview.

hardcode.notes: No new environment-dependent literals were added; responsive thresholds and labels were centralized into constants, and browser calls remain guarded.
